metadata: (info { (description "Hulu Wen is a race game played in early modern China. Players race to reach the center of a square spiral board.") (rules "Square spiral with 61 spaces. Two or more players. Two dice. ") (source "DLP evidence.") (id "1219") (version "1.3.14") (classification "board/race/reach/reconstruction/pending") (credit "Eric Piette") (origin "This game was played in China, from around 1644 to 1911.") } ) (graphics { (board Colour Phase0 (colour 223 178 110)) (board Colour InnerEdges (colour Black)) (board Colour OuterEdges (colour Black)) })
